glsa.title: libTIFF: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities in libTIFF could lead to the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

background.p: libTIFF provides support for reading and manipulating TIFF images.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities, ranging from integer overflows and NULL pointer dereferences to double frees, were reported in libTIFF.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by enticing a user to open a specially crafted TIFF image, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libTIFF users should upgrade to the latest version:
